name: Samsung Galaxy S21
description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 features a 6.2-inch AMOLED display, Exynos 2100 chipset, triple camera setup, and a 4000mAh battery. It supports 5G and comes with 128GB storage.

name: Sony WH-1000XM4
description: Sony WH-1000XM4 are noise-cancelling over-ear headphones that deliver superior sound quality, 30 hours of battery life, and touch sensor controls.

name: Dell XPS 13
description: The Dell XPS 13 is a premium ultrabook with a 13.3-inch display, Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD. It offers a thin and light design with long battery life.

name: Nike Air Max 270
description: The Nike Air Max 270 features a large Air unit in the heel for superior cushioning, a breathable mesh upper, and a rubber outsole for durability.

name: Apple Watch Series 7
description: Apple Watch Series 7 offers a larger, always-on Retina display, faster charging, and advanced health monitoring features including ECG and blood oxygen level measurement.

name: JBL Flip 5
description: The JBL Flip 5 is a portable Bluetooth speaker with powerful sound, 12 hours of playtime, IPX7 waterproof design, and available in multiple colors.

name: Canon EOS 1500D
description: The Canon EOS 1500D is an entry-level DSLR camera with a 24.1MP sensor, DIGIC 4+ processor, Full HD video recording, and built-in Wi-Fi and NFC connectivity.

name: Asus ROG Strix G15
description: The Asus ROG Strix G15 is a gaming laptop with a 15.6-inch FHD display, AMD Ryzen 7 processor, NVIDIA RTX 3060 GPU, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD.

name: Logitech G502 Hero
description: The Logitech G502 Hero is a high-performance gaming mouse with a 25,600 DPI sensor, customizable weights, and 11 programmable buttons.

name: Dyson V11 Absolute Pro
description: The Dyson V11 Absolute Pro is a powerful cordless vacuum cleaner with advanced filtration, dynamic load sensor, and up to 60 minutes of runtime.

name: Samsung 55-inch QLED 4K TV
description: The Samsung 55-inch QLED 4K TV offers stunning picture quality with Quantum Dot technology, 4K resolution, HDR, and smart TV features.

name: Instant Pot Duo 7-in-1
description: The Instant Pot Duo is a 7-in-1 electric pressure cooker that combines a pressure cooker, slow cooker, rice cooker, steamer, saut√© pan, yogurt maker, and warmer in one appliance.

name: Bose SoundLink Revolve+
description: The Bose SoundLink Revolve+ is a portable Bluetooth speaker offering 360-degree sound, 16-hour battery life, and a durable, water-resistant design.

name: Garmin Forerunner 245
description: The Garmin Forerunner 245 is a GPS running smartwatch with advanced running dynamics, music storage, and wellness tracking features.

name: KitchenAid Artisan Stand Mixer
description: The KitchenAid Artisan Stand Mixer is a versatile kitchen appliance with a 4.8L stainless steel bowl, 10-speed settings, and multiple attachments for various cooking needs.

name: Fitbit Charge 5
description: The Fitbit Charge 5 is a fitness and health tracker with built-in GPS, stress management tools, sleep tracking, and 7-day battery life.

name: Philips Hue White and Color Ambiance
description: The Philips Hue White and Color Ambiance is a smart lighting system offering millions of colors, voice control, and integration with smart home systems.

name: GoPro HERO9 Black
description: The GoPro HERO9 Black is an action camera with 5K video recording, 20MP photos, HyperSmooth stabilization, and a front-facing display.

name: Amazon Echo Dot (4th Gen)
description: The Amazon Echo Dot (4th Gen) is a smart speaker with Alexa, offering voice control, music streaming, smart home integration, and compact design.

name: Lenovo Yoga Smart Tab
description: The Lenovo Yoga Smart Tab is a 10.1-inch tablet with FHD display, Snapdragon 439 processor, dual JBL speakers, and Google Assistant built-in.

name: Microsoft Surface Laptop 4
description: The Microsoft Surface Laptop 4 offers a 13.5-inch PixelSense display, 11th Gen Intel Core processors, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD, combining sleek design with powerful performance.
